Game.Name: Super Pitfall II (USA) (Proto)
Game.plot: Atlantis no Nazo is an Action game, developed and published by SunSoft,which was released in Japan in 1986.Cheat: Infinite livesAt the title screen, press A on controller 2 11 times, then press B on controller 1 22 times, and hit start.Cheat: Alternate Final ZoneIn Zone 20, you'll see 3 big Moai statues standing next to each other and the message "KEYWORD NAGOYA" on the screen. In Japanese NA means 7, GO means 5 and YA means 8. So throw dynamite 7 times on top of the left statue, 5 times on top of the middle statue and 8 times on top of the right statue. If done right, you'll be warped to an alternative final zone.
